```{r}
```{r}
mtcars |> glimpse() |> invisible() |> select(c(cyl, mpg))
f <- function(x) invisible(x)


g <- function(x) invisible( glimpse(x))
                           
mtcars |> f() |> g() 
mtcars |> f() |> g() |> select(c(cyl))
```
